subject: I uploaded a few h2o method EVP files
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
--0-2113476907-1227111523=:14573
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I know a few of you are interested in this technique so I uploaded a few files from my sessions recording water. They have been coming thru quite loud and often the clarity is remarkable for me. 

Most of these EVP are in the -74 speed range. Well beyond the natural ability of a human voice. (For the newbies, try recording your voice then slow it down to -74 in audacity and you will see what I mean)

http://www.esnips.com/web/WaterEVP

Attaching one here for those who get the daily emails =)

Misty
